description: A professional-looking wool blazer.  Unlike the original, this one is easy to wear.
A professional-looking wool blazer.  Unlike the original, this one is easy to wear.  It is specifically designed to fit Huge survivors.
A white button-down shirt with long sleeves.
A white button-down shirt with long sleeves.  It is specifically designed to fit Huge survivors.
A short, breezy cotton skirt.  Unlike an ordinary skirt, this one has two pockets to store stuff.
A short, breezy cotton skirt.  Unlike an ordinary skirt, this one has two pockets to store stuff.  It is specifically designed to fit Huge survivors.
A simple crimson bow tie.  Best worn with a high school uniform.
A simple crimson necktie.  Best worn with a high school uniform.
A pair of uniform pants.  Slightly warmer than jeans.
A pair of uniform pants.  Slightly warmer than jeans.  It is specifically designed to fit Huge survivors.
A plastic coat with a hood and two very large pockets.  Provides protection from rain.  It also have a pair of frog eyes as a bonus!
School vigilantine, night study watch, principal's pet.  Whatever you call it, this armband was a sign of some power back in the day.
A plastic ID card, wearing this will not give you any effects.
A plastic ID card, wearing this will not give you any effects.
A plastic ID card, wearing this will not give you any effects.
A jacket made from thick leather and cotton.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts and chilly weather.
A sweatshirt with a hood and a "kangaroo pocket" in the front for storage.  This one have an actual hood for you to put on.

use_action.msg: You took out your hood and covered your head with it.

description: A sweatshirt with a hood and a "kangaroo pocket" in the front for storage.  This one have an actual hood for you to put on... and you did!

use_action.msg: You took off your hood from your head.

description: A red and fancy robe for a king, this one have dragons as a decoration.
A red, black and fancy robe for a queen, this one have dragons as a decoration.
A sky blue robe for a Korean nobleman.  Looks fancy when facing the apocalypse.  Fancy, but encumbering.
A white robe for a Korean nobleman.  Looks fancy when facing the apocalypse.  Much easier to wear compared to dopo, but also less warmer.
A spiked helmet once worn by a marching band member.  This hat is quite fancy, but that is it.
A white button-down shirt with long sleeves, for marching band members.  It also has several golden buttons and ropes.
A short, breezy cotton skirt for marching band members.  Unlike an ordinary skirt, this one has two pockets to store stuff.
A pair of uniform pants for marching band members.  Slightly warmer than jeans.
A candy-apple-red fur and leather jacket, for marching band members.  It also has several golden buttons and ropes, so it is quite fancy.
A pink hair accessory with cute flower textures.  This one has a spike, which could be a weapon if needed.
A leather strap worn on the hip for holding several, bit-larger-than-pistol sized guns.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.
A loose-fitting traditional Korean outfit, this one has some pink and white patterns on it.
A short, breezy cotton skirt.  Easy to move in and warm, but there is no pockets to store stuff.
A purple cotton jacket.  Good for brisk weather and light workout.
A pair of purple tracksuit pants.
A pair of purple tracksuit shorts.
A piece of suit which has five colors, and used in Korean traditional events.
Often used in Korean events, this one is quite fancy.  Its wide brim helps keep the sun out of your eyes.

use_action.msg: You adjust the %s to cover your head.

description: A cotton skull bandana, worn over the head for warmth and to keep the wind out of your hair.  Activate to adjust it to wear over your mouth instead.

use_action.msg: You adjust the %s to cover your mouth.

description: A colorful and heavy wig fit for a traditional asian woman.  The wig have some space to store stuff.
A simple yet quite fancy fabric covering tied over your forehead.  Could be used as the lightest armor, if needed.
A white traditonal Korean shirt with blue vest as a decoration.
A pair of Korean traditional hanbok pants.  Pretty comfy when you wear them.
A complex, wristwatch with lots of tools strapped on it, which made this looks like a gauntlet.  You can do so many things with this!
A skateboard is a type of sports equipment used for skateboarding.  Very fast on flat floors, but they make it hard to move on rough terrain, take hits, or to dodge effectively.

A skateboard is a type of sports equipment used for skateboarding.  Very fast on flat floors, but they make it hard to move on rough terrain, take hits, or to dodge effectively.  This one is modified by... adding an engine?
A narrow plank used in surfing.  Surfboards are relatively light, but are strong enough to support an individual standing on them while riding an ocean wave.
A plastic chunk filled with air in order to let people float in the water safely.
A high, black cap with a round top and two flat parts on the back of them.  Traditionally worn by kings from various parts of Asia.
The most famous hat of traditional korean outfit, this was the Korean version of the top hat.  Also called as "God".
The less famous hat of traditional korean outfit compared to huklip, this was the Korean version of the top hat.  Easliy seen on Korean bills.
A one piece snowman suit used (headgear not included) by some event workers related to winter and christmas.
A snowman head for event workers, designed to provide comfort and warmth.
A black cotton jacket.  Good for brisk weather and light workout.
A pair of black tracksuit pants.
A light cloak meant to be thrown over your body.

//: Got this line of code and modified it from PK's rebalancing mod.
name: tactical shield
description: A ballistic shield designed to protect the approach of its holder and anybody standing behind them.  It is heavy and somewhat cumbersome, but its protection cannot be denied.  When activated it will be held close and in front of you.

use_action.msg: The tactical shield is pulled to a defensive posture!

name: tactical shield (def)
description: A ballistic shield designed to protect the approach of its holder and anybody standing behind them.  It is heavy and really cumbersome, but its protection cannot be denied.  It is currently being used, and slowing you down.
A green apron made of thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts and dirt.
A cyan apron made of thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts and scraps of food.
A black apron made of thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts and paint splatter.
A plastic ham-looking item, marking the wearer as some kind of a gamer.
Actual... plant? Wearing this will give you no effects.

"Say hello to my little snowman!"
Tony "Scarface" Montana
A small fabric bandolier for small items, which can be belt clipped, designed to be worn around the wrist.

A very large cardboard box, the sort children would have loved to hide in, when there were still children.  Now you can also hide in it. 

...

This is snake.

A very large cardboard box, the sort children would have loved to hide in, when there were still children.  Now you can also hide in it. 

...

Snake? Snake? Snaaaaaaaake!
A soft cotton hat.  Commonly worn by navy forces and sea cadet corps.
A white shirt with short sleeves and a black scarf, for sea cadet corps.
A pair of white shorts.  Comfortable and light.
A simple wooden whistle, with a cord to wear it around your neck.
A plain hairpin to keep your hair in place.
A plain hairpin to keep your hair in place.
Whether you are cleaning zoos, feeding some animals, or fighting some undead, this is the hat for the job.
Whether you are cleaning zoos, feeding some animals, or robbing some banks, this is the hat for the job.
A lightweight helmet that is fashioned to look like a real military helmet, but is made of plastic and only protects against BB's and other light threats.
A protective face mask made of thick plastic.  Commonly worn by pink soldiers.
A protective face mask made of thick plastic.  Commonly worn by pink soldiers.
A protective face mask made of thick plastic.  Commonly worn by pink soldiers.
A green cotton jacket.  Good for brisk weather and light workout.
A pair of green tracksuit pants.
A pink cotton jacket.  Good for brisk weather and light workout.
A pair of pink tracksuit pants.
Useful for carrying medical items, documents, or first aid kits.
An insulated, breathable hoodie made for alpine skiing.  Very warm, and with sizable pockets.
Also known as a "bigpack", this rucksack is prized by pack rats but may lead to a bad back.  Made from a body bag and some cordage.
A tough jacket with lots of pockets.  Favored by the school security.
A tough pair of pants lined with pockets.  Favored by the school security.
A short, breezy cotton skirt.  Unlike an ordinary skirt, this one has two pockets to store stuff.
A snug-fitting cotton hat.  Quite warm and perfect for holidays.
A makeshift bag, cobbled together from rags.  Provides a decent amount of storage.
A makeshift bag, cobbled together from rags. Provides a decent amount of storage.
An armored jacket made from thick leather and kevlar plates.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from harm.
A short-sleeved kevlar shirt.
A witch hat, wearing it will provide no effects.  At least it shields the sun rays.
A witch hat, wearing it will provide no effects.  At least it shields the sun rays.

name.str: pair of atomic light amp goggles
name.str_pl: pairs of atomic light amp goggles

description: A pair of atomic battery-powered goggles that amplify ambient light, allowing you to see in the dark.  Use it to turn them on.  This model has an integrated atomic cell, which allows infinite power usage.

name.str_pl: pairs of atomic light amp goggles (on)
name.str: pair of atomic light amp goggles (on)

description: A pair of atomic battery-powered light amplifying goggles with an infrared illuminator, allowing you to see in the dark.  It is turned on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn them off.  This model has an integrated atomic cell, which allows infinite power usage.
//: 2019 commercial models can operate at under 0.375W with the IR illuminator on

description: A pair of atomic battery-powered goggles that grant infrared vision, allowing you to see warm-blooded creatures in the dark.  Use it to turn them on.  This model has an integrated atomic cell, which allows infinite power usage.

A pair of atomic battery-powered goggles that grant infrared vision, allowing you to see warm-blooded creatures in the dark.  Use it to turn them off.  This model has an integrated atomic cell, which allows infinite power usage.

A pair of atomic battery-powered goggles that grant multi-vision, allowing you to see in the dark and see warm-blooded creatures in the dark.  Use it to turn them on.  This model has an integrated atomic cell, which allows infinite power usage.

A pair of atomic battery-powered goggles that grant multi-vison, allowing you to see in the dark and see warm-blooded creatures in the dark.  Use it to turn them off.  This model has an integrated atomic cell, which allows infinite power usage.

A modified version of Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  Its armor pouches have chunks of kevlar in them, and the whole kevlar vest on outer side, giving it extra protection with flexibility loss and additional weight.  It has four pouches capable of carrying magazines.

Based on some commercial weight lifting devices, this crappy looking exoskeleton was created.  Every spring helps the user to loft and carry stuff better, and one could also fire a heavy mounted gun from one's hip.  The drawback is that it is highly encumbering, and it does gives the wearer almost no protection.
This is a portable bag, originally intended to allow soldiers to carry extra ammunition.  Somehow you could 'get' the ammo that you need by using this.
This is a portable bag, originally intended to allow soldiers to carry extra ammunition.  Somehow you could 'get' the ammo that you need by using this.  Less useful compared to original one.
An all-encompassing tan helmet that covers your entire face and neck, providing simple protection from all sorts of damage.
A cool cosplay vest, easy to wear but offer nearly no protection.

A secret Phoenix corp invention - the Kappa secured container. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

A secret Phoenix corp invention - the Alpha secured container. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>
This is a paper bag with holes on the eye parts.  These are usually worn by rioters to hide their identity.
A helmet with a plastic shield that covers your entire face.  Activate to raise the face shield.
A ballistic helmet with a plastic face shield which is raised up.  Activate to lower the shield.
A shiny pair of demon horns on a headband.  It does nothing, but there's no reason not to look good even if no one's looking.
A glossy red leather tail weighted down with tiny beads of plastic.  Sways behind you when you walk.
A shiny pair of brown bunny ears on a headband.  It does nothing, but there's no reason not to look good even if no one's looking.
A shiny pair of white bunny ears on a headband.  It does nothing, but there's no reason not to look good even if no one's looking.
A shiny pair of demon wings.  It does nothing, but there's no reason not to look good even if no one's looking.
A shiny pair of funny glasses.  It does nothing, but there's no reason not to look good even if no one's looking.
A small, improvised metal shield historically used for dueling rather than protection from arrows.  It's small and light enough to not hinder the use of your hands.
A full-body kevlar suit.  Makes the apocalypse feel a little more classy with some protection.  Good for protecting bullets, but cannot protect fully.
A Red Sox cap.  It provides a little bit of warmth.
An old-fashioned paper glasses tinted with red and blue films on each eye.
Hat that is woven out of straw and used widely in Asia.  Its brim helps keep the sun out of your eyes, and stops the rain too.  Could wear it in order to consult with the elder gods or something.
A crude wooden shield, lacking any metal or leather reinforcement.  Light weight but not very tough.

A pair of earmuffs favored by helicopter pilots.  Without batteries or when turned off they function like normal earmuffs and block all sound.  They will block sounds over a certain decibel amount when turned on.  The earmuffs are currently off.

A pair of earmuffs favored by helicopter pilots.  The earmuffs are turned on.  They will block sounds over a certain decibel amount and also can handle radio signals, assuming it is charged with batteries.
//: 3M Peltors claim to go 100 hours on 2 AAs

description: A light leather jacket with a bleached white surface.  It has two pockets on the front, mainly for putting your hands in.  A golden scorpion is embedded on its back.  Fit for a real human being, and a real hero.

A type of camouflage clothing designed to resemble the background environment  such as foliage, snow or sand. 

...

Don't do anything stupid.

use_action.msg: You open up your ghillie suit.

description:
A type of camouflage clothing designed to resemble the background environment  such as foliage, snow or sand. 

...

Oi Suzy!

use_action.msg: You tie up your ghillie suit.

description: A leather sheath for holding several knives and other small blades.  It is harder to use compared to a normal one.  Activate to sheathe/draw a weapon.

A large American flag cape made to fly in even the worst conditions.  Wearing this does not give you the ability to fly, shoot lasers from your eyes, or run really fast.  At least you can have an obsession of drinking milk.
A thin, rounded skullcap.  A ice cube shaped cotton ball is on a flower hat.
These may not be the best hat, but you can also use this as an emergency throwing weapon.  Good for cosplaying the villan fighting against a spy or a runner-up martial artist.
Also called tarboosh, this is a felt headdress in the shape of a short, cylindrical, with a black tassel attached to the top.  Good to cosplay a madman with a box.  Geronimo!
Internally powered by a plutonium fuel cell, this small sized energy shield represents the pinnacle of Rivtech's energy shield technology.  Use it to turn it on.

use_action.need_charges_msg: It seems like this device needs power.

description: Internally powered by a plutonium fuel cell, this small sized energy shield represents the pinnacle of Rivtech's energy shield technology.  It is turned on, and continually draining power.  Use it to turn it off.
A waterproof hat made to be worn in bad weather.  Provides extra protection from rain.
Also called a tammie, this is a traditional Scottish bonnet worn by men.  And no, you cannot make a warlus to wear it; this is New England, pal.
An extremely heavy set of armor-plated leather glove and boot.
A leather scabbard, big enough for almost any sword.  Designed to be strapped to the back, it's very difficult to draw from without considerable practice.  Activate to sheath/draw a sword.

A pair of super stylish sunglasses.  Look good while keeping the glare out of your eyes.  You could throw this as an irregular attack, just like that crotch-punching American actor who fought a four armed giant.
A custom-built pair of armored goggles with tinted lenses.  Comfortable and built to last, they provide excellent protection from environmental dangers.

A pair of orange tinted stylish sunglasses.  Look good while keeping the glare out of your eyes.  You could throw this as an irregular attack, just like that crotch-punching American actor who fought a four armed giant.
A sleek navy/green black suit for general officers in the army or the navy.  A symbol of a bygone world.
A hat made from the pelts of bears.  Extremely warm, but heavy and large.
A special zentai which protects the actor while taking an action movie.
The only hat for a magician.  Look exquisite while showing a magic trick in the face of danger!
Useful for carrying drinks or frozen foods.  Somehow, this emits a cloud of cool air.
Long, flowing robes.  Simple and comfortable to wear.  The uniform of the school mystery club!  The hood is on, which draws a mysterious shade on your face.

use_action.msg: You take the hood off from your cloak.

description: Long, flowing robes.  Simple and comfortable to wear.  The uniform of the school mystery club!  The hood is off, which shows your face.

use_action.msg: You put your hood over your head.

description: Korean(and various Asian) version of the Brigandine armor, this coatlike armor offers great protection from harm.  Also looks pretty cool.
A spiked helmet once worn by Korean military officers.  The spike is very sharp.
A spiked helmet once worn by Korean military officers.  The spike is very sharp.  Has an extra tassel on the top.
Korean(and various Asian) version of the famous Brigandine armor.  Now upgraded with kevlar and steel, this suit of armor accomplish both the looks and the protection.
A stick with a paper lantern on it.  Fragile but fancy.
A stick with a paper lantern on it.  Fragile but fancy.  It does not provide much light, but it lasts a long time.  It is turned on.  Use it to turn it off.
A thick awesome looking blazer, lined with pockets.  Great for storage, and makes you stand proud.
A vintage, yet awesome looking hat, with a symbol of a high school symbol.  A symbol of a bygone world.
A medieval helmet that provides excellent protection to the entire head, at the cost of great encumbrance.  Looking like a skull, this thing is also pretty cool.
Also called lobster-tailed pot helmet, this helm provides excellent protection for the head, with a mask for the mouth.
A heavy helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.  It is labeled as the tanker helmet.
Do you like hats?  Cause if you do, I put a hat on a hat so you could wear the hat while you are wearing the hat.  Hope it's worth the wait.
A pair of fancy elbow pads made of stout plastic and cloth.

A really long wool scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  With the extra length, it's enough to handle nonstandard facial features and accommodate your hands too.  Use it to loosen it if you get too warm.

A really long wool scarf, worn over the mouth for warmth.  With the extra length, it's enough to handle nonstandard facial features and accommodate your hands too.  Use it to wear it tighter if you get too cold.
A crude form of armor made from stacked paper and rolls of duct tape, this armor offers a surprising amount of protection.
A crude form of armor made from stacked paper and rolls of duct tape, this armor offers a surprising amount of protection.  Reinforced, this gives more protection compared to the original.
A crude form of armor made from stacked paper and rolls of duct tape, this helmet offers a surprising amount of protection.
A peaked cap worn by the armed forces of many nations, with the army symbol embroidered on the front above the plastic cap.  A symbol of a bygone world.
A heavy, hand-built combination armor made from a reinforced bulletproof vest and a metal-plated jumpsuit.  Protects from the elements as well as from harm.

A heavy, hand-built combination armor made from a reinforced bulletproof vest and a superalloy-plated jumpsuit.  Lighter and easier to move in than an equivalent suit made with steel.  Protects from the elements as well as from harm.
A lightweight, hand-built combination armor made from a bulletproof vest and a jumpsuit, all reinforced with superalloy.  It's fairly protective, but less so than a thicker, more comprehensive suit.
A lightweight, hand-built combination armor made from a cut-down bulletproof vest and a reinforced jumpsuit.  Protects from the elements as well as from harm.
Heavy, hand-built combination armor made from a cut-down bulletproof vest and a reinforced flame-resistant Nomex jumpsuit.  Protects the wearer from fire and the elements.
A thick jacket of quilted fabric extending down to your knees, designed to be worn underneath mail or other armor.  Or worn on its own, if you can't afford proper armor.
A sturdy scavenger's outfit made from refitted pre-Cataclysm protective gear.  It has a lot of storage space.
A suit of armor made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings; the loose collection of plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.
Thick leather body armor that has been reinforced with strategically-placed metal plates.  Strong and comfortable.
An extremely heavy suit of ornamental armor.
A heavy suit of ornamental armor, remade using modern superalloy.
A suit of Gothic plate armor.
A suit of Gothic plate armor, remade using modern superalloy.
A makeshift outfit made from pre-Cataclysm clothing designed for long travels.  It has a lot of storage space.
A light makeshift outfit made from pre-Cataclysm clothing designed for long summer travels.  It offers less storage space and armor compared to regular nomad gear.
A lightweight, hand-built combination armor made from a cut-down bulletproof vest and a reinforced neoprene wetsuit.  Protects from the elements as well as from harm.
A foam board that swimmers use to support the weight of the upper body while they focus on kicking.  Not made to be used as a shield, this thing is quite fragile.
A full-face mask made of gold, in the vein of Roman cavalry masks.  Provides decent protection and gives an imposing, yet cool post-apocalyptic look.
A full-face mask made of superalloy, in the vein of survivors.  Provides decent protection and gives an imposing post-apocalyptic look.
A full-face mask made of bone, in the vein of Roman cavalry masks.  Provides decent protection and gives an imposing post-apocalyptic look.
A warm hood covering that protects the head from the cold.
A tough jacket with lots of pockets.  Favored by the navy.
A tough pair of pants lined with pockets.  Favored by the navy.
A tough jacket with lots of pockets.  Favored by the special forces.
A tough pair of pants lined with pockets.  Favored by the special forces.

A Modular Bullet Resistant Vest.  Hardened steel plates have been inserted, greatly increasing its protection at the cost of a great deal of weight and loss of flexibility.  It has six pouches capable of carrying magazines.  Modified from the original, wearing this makes you float in water, at the cost of some encumberence.
A fuzzy round tail weighted down with tiny beads of plastic.  Sways behind you when you walk.

//: A folded bandana still takes up some space on the head.
description: A simple fabric covering tied over the eyes to keep your sweat from your eyes.  Also useful for protection against some unwanted liquids from outside.

//: A folded bandana still takes up some space on the head.
description: A simple fabric covering tied over the eyes to keep your sweat from your eyes.  Useful for protection against some unwanted liquids from outside.  Also useful to keep some ammo at your hand.
A protective face mask made of thick wire.  Commonly worn by baseball catchers.
A simple piece of machine that straps over the mouth.  Makes noise, and protects your mouth and ears while doing it.
Feathered headgear traditionally worn by male leaders of the Native Americans.
Thick leather body armor.  Light and comfortable.  Looks good when you have to choose between one evil and another.
An old diving helmet that provides excellent protection to the entire head, at the cost of great encumbrance.
A cool cosplay vest, easy to wear but offer nearly no protection.
A cool cosplay suit, easy to wear but offer nearly no protection.
A full gas mask prop that covers the face and eyes.  Unlike the original, this is just for the looks.  Offers some protection.
A cool cosplay suit, easy to wear but offer nearly no protection.
A full helmet prop that covers the face and eyes.  This is just for the looks.  Offers some protection.
A cool cosplay suit, easy to wear but offer nearly no protection.

The backpack, designed to resemble a vintage military radio, features rugged green casing and metal dials for a retro aesthetic.  Equipped with advanced insulation and grounding technology, it renders the wearer completely immune to electric shocks when activated.

use_action.msg: You turn the jammer pack on.

description: The backpack, designed to resemble a vintage military radio, features rugged green casing and metal dials for a retro aesthetic.  Equipped with advanced insulation and grounding technology, now it renders the wearer completely immune to electric shocks.

use_action.msg: You turn the jammer pack off.

description: This is a pair of gloves with internal battery-powered shocking elements.  Use it to turn it on.
This is a pair of gloves with internal battery-powered shocking elements.  They are currently on, and continually draining batteries.  Use it to turn them off.
A small wooden shield historically used for light protection from arrows.  This one is made of wood.  It's small and light enough to not hinder the use of your hands.
A large leather shield from Africa.  Light, less encumbering and covers a lot of areas, but not that sturdy compard to the wooden ones.
An eye-shaped amulet believed by many to protect against the evil eye.  Also doubles as a set of prayer beads, if you're so inclined.
A warm covering that protects the head and face from the cold, improvised from bandages.
A piece of clerical clothing, usually worn by Buddhist priests.
Plain black ninja gi.  Loose and flowing, it offers little protection, and little encumbrance.  This one is quite different...
Plain black ninja mask.  These are usually worn by ninjas to hide their identity.  This one is quite different...
You're shrowded within the shadows.
You're shrowded within the shadows.
Plain black ninja gi.  Loose and flowing, it offers little protection, and little encumbrance.
Plain black ninja mask.  These are usually worn by ninjas to hide their identity.
Modern reinforced tactical combat boots, modified.  Very durable and protects your feet from booby traps.
A pair of sunglasses, good for keeping the glare out of your eyes.  This one have a funny shaped pair of lenses.
A modified magazine satchel worn at the waist which is capable of holding six magazines, ammo belts, speedloaders, and grenades of nearly any size close at hand.
//: Able to hold up to a fully-loaded .308 or .50 BMG ammo belt

description: A leather strap worn on the hip for holding akimbo pistols.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.

//: A folded bandana still takes up some space on the head.
description: A simple fabric covering tied over the eye parts to hide identity.  Useful for cosplaying.

//: A folded bandana still takes up some space on the head.
description: A simple fabric covering tied over an eye to block sight.  Useful for looking like a pirate.  This one covers the left eye.

use_action.msg: You change the eye patch to cover your right eye.

//: A folded bandana still takes up some space on the head.
description: A simple fabric covering tied over an eye to block sight.  Useful for looking like a pirate.  This one covers the right eye.

use_action.msg: You change the eye patch to cover your left eye.

//: A folded bandana still takes up some space on the head.
description: A simple fabric covering tied over an eye to block sight.  This one covers the left eye.

use_action.msg: You change the eye patch to cover your right eye.

//: A folded bandana still takes up some space on the head.
description: A simple fabric covering tied over an eye to block sight.  This one covers the right eye.

use_action.msg: You change the eye patch to cover your left eye.

description: A cape meant to be thrown over your body, like a cloak.  Looks cooler though.
You're shrowded within the shadows.
A shiny ring which is a symbol for many fantasy creatures.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A high, white cap with a very unique shape.  Traditionally worn by bishops.
A camo leather jacket, for space soilders.  It also has several golden buttons and ropes, so it is quite fancy.
An ornamental suit of Japanese samurai armor.  Looks fancier compared to the traditional ones, and looks bulkier.
A crude wooden shield lacking any metal or leather reinforcement.  Tolerable weight but not very tough.  Also have a sheath to hold a sword.
A crude wooden tower shield lacking any metal or leather reinforcement.  Bulky, but offers a decent amount of protection.  Also have a sheath to hold a sword.
A simple round shield made of wood with leather reinforcement.  Sturdier and stronger than a simple wooden shield, and less encumbering than a metal one.  Also have a sheath to hold a sword.
A simple round shield made of wood with bands of steel reinforcing it.  Stronger than a simple wooden shield, but also more encumbering.  Also have a sheath to hold a sword.
A large shield made of wood with leather reinforcement.  Sturdier and stronger than a basic wooden shield, and less encumbering than a metal one.  Also have a sheath to hold a sword.
A large shield made of wood with steel bands reinforcing it.  Stronger than a simple wooden shield, but also more encumbering.  Also have a sheath to hold a sword.

A shield made out of steel armor plating with handles welded on.  It's a lot heavier and less well-made compared to a proper medieval shield, but it certainly works.  Also have a sheath to hold a sword.

A shield made out of superalloy armor plating with handles welded on.  It's heavier and less well-made compared to a proper medieval shield, but it certainly works.  Also have a sheath to hold a sword.
A metal reinforced shield with spikes jutting out of it.  Can be used as a melee weapon if need be.  Also have a sheath to hold a sword.
A large metal reinforced shield with spikes jutting out of it.  Can be used as a melee weapon if need be.  Also have a sheath to hold a sword.

A heavy composite shield used by SWAT teams and other armed forces.  It can handle the occasional pistol bullet, but its heavy-duty nature means it's quite encumbering and doesn't cover the legs very well.  Also have a fabric ammo pouch that can be strapped to your leg and capable of holding two magazines close at hand.

A face-covering mask made from tightly woven rings of iron chainmail, modeled after ancient battle masks.  It's lighter than a full metal mask but offers modest protection and a fearsome post-apocalyptic presence.
